Label: Annotation
Description: A connection between a target resource (like a chemical compound) and content that annotates it (like textual information or data)

Label: PubChem Compound
Description: A unique chemical structure with standardized representation in PubChem

Label: PubChem Substance
Description: A chemical record deposited by a data contributor, which may map to one or more compounds

Label: Textual Body
Description: Text content that provides information about an annotated resource

Label: Has Body
Description: Links an annotation to the content that describes or comments on the target

Label: Has Target
Description: Links an annotation to the resource being annotated (e.g., a chemical compound)

Label: Type
Description: Specifies what kind of thing an entity is

Label: Value
Description: The actual text or data content of an annotation

Label: Format
Description: The file format or media type of the content

Label: Subject
Description: The chemical compound or substance that the annotation is about

Label: Chemical Name
Description: The common or systematic name of a chemical substance

Label: Molecular Formula
Description: The types and numbers of atoms in a molecule

Label: InChI
Description: International Chemical Identifier - a textual identifier for chemical substances

Label: SMILES
Description: Simplified Molecular Input Line Entry System - a line notation for chemical structures

Label: Has Attribute
Description: Links a chemical entity to its properties or characteristics

Label: Has Value
Description: Assigns a specific measurement or quantity to an attribute

Label: Chemical Property Annotation
Description: Information about physical or chemical properties like molecular weight, melting point, or solubility

Label: Biological Activity Annotation
Description: Data about how a compound interacts with biological systems or affects living organisms

Label: Toxicology Data Annotation
Description: Information about potential toxic effects, safety data, and environmental hazards

Label: Pharmacology Data Annotation
Description: Information about therapeutic uses, drug interactions, and mechanisms of action

Label: Literature Reference Annotation
Description: Citations and excerpts from scientific publications mentioning the compound

Label: Patent Data Annotation
Description: Information from patents that describe or claim the chemical compound

Label: Synonym Annotation
Description: Alternative names and identifiers for the chemical compound

Label: Annotation ANID1
Description: An annotation containing regulatory limits and chemical property information for Strontium compounds

Label: Annotation ANID10
Description: An annotation containing scientific literature references and biological activity data

Label: Annotation ANID100
Description: An annotation with toxicological data and safety information
